title.rendered: Vista Capital Advisors & Valutico Host Valuation Event in Brussels

content.rendered:
Vista Capital Advisors & Valutico Host Valuation Event in Brussels

 

 

Vista Capital Advisors and Valutico are joining forces on the 29th of September for an interactive seminar on business valuations.

If you’re interested in learning more about the topic of how to value a business, then you’re invited to join us live in person in Brussels, please find the details below. 

 

Event Details:

 

In-person event at the Vista Capital offices in Brussels (Heizel)

Date: Thursday 29/9/2022 from 10:00 to 12:00 followed by complimentary lunch

Place: Buro & Design Center, Heizel Esplanade 1, 1020 Brussels

Free event – reserve your seat here


Event Program:

 

10:00 Business valuation in practice

  • Live case study valuation by Vista Capital Advisors and Valutico
  • Q&A in attendance of Valutico’s founders and head of product

11:00 DIY Valuation session using the Valutico platform (bring your laptop)

12:00 Lunch

 

About the Organisers:

 

Vista Capital Advisors is an independent corporate finance advisory boutique based in Brussels, Belgium. It provides high-quality financial advisory services to individual and corporate clients in relation to mergers & acquisitions, financing, restructurings and other strategic matters.

 

Valutico is the professional cloud-based valuation platform, using the world’s best financial databases to provide an all-in-one valuation solution. It is used by corporate finance professionals, accountants, banks and investment funds to streamline the valuation workflow.

Company valuations are typically restricted to Microsoft Excel & PowerPoint, supplemented with various database subscriptions, leading to a time-consuming and error-prone workflow. Valutico aims to centralise and streamline this entire process by bringing it to the cloud, using state-of-the-art algorithms & relying on the leading financial databases. This results in a process which is up to 50% more efficient.

 

If you would like to book your spot, do so here

@graph.description: Chris Botha has over 12 years experience in corporate finance and M&A. Prior to working in corporate finance Chris studied at the University of Johannesburg where he gained an honours degree in investment management. Chris is also a CFA Charterholder.
